channel.title: @@~~pkin 4 life~~@@ (comment and download)!
channel.description:
[center][font=Verdana][size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt][b]pkin 4 life v1![/b][/size][/size][/size][/font][/center]
this is my first release so give me a break if its not as good as you wanted it to be.
if you use this as a source, i would like to have some credit.
[u]what iv included:[/u]
* added spec for some wepons. * infinity ring added. * added skilling/ not fully. * fully coded jail/unjail commands. * new interfaces. * new boss. * new areas. * correct barrage runes/to barrage. * added lots of new stuff. * admins cannot drop.
and alot more stuff!
i have not added drops for any npcs or made safe zones. i am lazy with that sort of stuff and i am still trying to know what cornor to start at.
[b]commands:[/b] [code]skills kbd kq anti edgepk teampk barrows modinfo commands info train shops mypos empty normal jad char pass home mypk[/code]
and alot more!
[b]mod commands:[/b] [code]mod food yell jail unjail az kick sweet notedbarrows pure[/code]
and more!
[b]admin commands:[/b] [code]banuser xteleto xteletome unban master god godoff[/code]
and more!
[b]owner commands:[/b] [code]getpass emote gfx ipban alltome xslime tele m pnpc demote givemod giveadmin reboot hax npc server bank update checkip kickall rich[/code]
now for some pictures,
home: [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/1h3vhv.jpg[/img]
jad: [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/o73o7m.jpg[/img]
kbd: [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/10xfwgg.jpg[/img]
train 1: [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/10cqa2u.jpg[/img]
train 2: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/ir6op0.jpg[/img]
mod/admin zone: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2lcb3a0.jpg[/img]
kq: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/30uz8xu.jpg[/img]
skilling: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/16aptgi.jpg[/img]
shops: [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2madcn.jpg[/img]
barrows: [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/21nkunq.jpg[/img]
jail: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2ro5cah.jpg[/img]
teampk: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2my0vbc.jpg[/img]
1v1: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2pqqtub.jpg[/img]
boss: [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2s8ip9f.jpg[/img]
[u]download:[/u]
http://uppit.com/1AQ5DG
please also comment, on how well it is for my first server.
i will not be making another v2 but i will be making another server with a different base and i will be releasing. i will be adding more to it than this server with drops/safezones and alot more.
[b][u]credits:[/u][/b]
5% tutorials. 15% for allstar or czar base. 5% for others who helped me in server help section. 75% to me for editing/adding and deleteing.

item.title: @@~~pkin 4 life~~@@ (comment and download)!
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

jc22493:

Do you even know how to create safezones? Your skilling area is wild…

actually, yes i do, i just keep forgettin which cornor to which. so what if it is, people will move the skilling area, and change it ect anyway, if not then they can actually make safezones them selfs, little things make big problems. tbh, they should know how to do safezones anyway, if they are making a server to host. if you look on any other release, then you should see there are not safe zones, maybe if someone released they cannot be boved as really, making safezones are the basics of java.

ChaosPkers:

I like it, but almost every where is wild in the new spots you added. I won’t be the one to complain that you should be the one to add them, but a lot of fags don’t know how and will cry to you about it :p… Like I said I like it. Not gonna dl though.

idc lmao, if they are making a server, then they will have to make safezones. in every source, i bet there is one place wildy.

Read full topic
